So anyway. That's why I'm thinking of

<sp:3:0:2:0800>So anyway. That's why I'm thinking of

Greeting:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What is it?<sp:5:1:0> Are you heading to <clr:0000>Lurelin
Village <clr:ffff>too?
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><clr:0000>Lurelin Village <clr:ffff>is Hyrule's number one
vacation spot. Even the princess herself
used to stay there.
Thank goodness those pirates were
chased out and they could restore it
to its former beauty.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I walked all the way to the village, and
what did I find?

A whole lotta rubble, that's what. The
pirates really left their mark.

So, I guess it makes sense they're not
taking tourists.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>And it explains why the <clr:0000>village head <clr:ffff>and
that <clr:0000>carpenter <clr:ffff>were so somber when
I passed them on the shore.
Those two looked so pitiful, I couldn't
even get up the nerve to talk to them.
FriendGreet_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:TalkPositive>I know that smell... <sp:5:0:0>*sniff* *sniff* <sp:5:0:0>You're
a treasure hunter, aren't you?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You probably think you'll strike it rich
searching the debris—<sp:5:0:0>the "Zonai ruins"—<sp:5:0:0>
from the Upheaval.
I used to be like you. I was going to shake
all the treasure loose from those ruins and
get my one-in-a-million score!
...<sp:5:1:0>So I thought.<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>And you know what happened?<sp:5:1:0>


The <clr:0000>Zonai Survey Team <clr:ffff>crowded me out.
They went and claimed all the best ruins
for themselves.
And <clr:0000>Cece <clr:ffff>and her smartly dressed
sycophants, they took up the hunt for
<clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>In short? It's over. The bones are picked
clean. You'd be better off just going to
<clr:0000>Lurelin Village <clr:ffff>in the <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff>.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
That's what I'm going to do—kick back on
the beach and try to enjoy retirement.
BackRange_02_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I get it! <sp:5:0:0>I mean, this is Lurelin Village
we're talking about. Hyrule's number one
vacation spot.
What kinda halfwit comes here and
doesn't drop by the village?

Oh, right...<sp:5:1:0> Me.<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But only because I forgot to bring
my swimsuit.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>I just have to go to <clr:0000>Lakeside Stable <clr:ffff>and

relax myself silly.
BackRange_02_4:

BackRange_02_5:

GoalPoint_01:

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Wow. I guess that explains why the

BackRange_02:
